links.title: Tesla - More Than An Auto Company
links.description: Apple renamed itself and Tesla renamed itself. You may say, "So what?!" Let's dive into why this really is important to you. To prepare, expect the unexpected. This is about Tesla, but not about motors, autos, or vehicles, and I promise it won't be boring. A name is an identity, description, and value.
